segments.en: 171–173. Desire, Etc. for the Suffering Interior

segments.pli: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ, tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, you should give up desire … greed … desire and greed for what is suffering.

segments.pli: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo … pe …
segments.en: The eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are suffering …”

segments.pli: mano dukkho; tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
Yaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
